description:
Shachi is determined to protect Kenshiro, whom he believes to be the savior. He continues his journey, disguising himself as a rag and hiding Kenshiro in a coffin. Kaioh is consumed with fear of Kenshiro`s limitless potential, and instructs his henchmen to search for Lin. For her part, after getting swallowed by underground currents, Lin is rescued by Kaioh`s younger sister, Sayaka. Meanwhile, heavily scarred by the killing of Jukei, Hyoh seeks out Sayaka to mend his wounds, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Destined Encounter of Hyoh and Ken! Both Are Yet to Know Their Secrets!!
Les destins se croisent : Hyo rencontre Ken ! Il ne reconnaît pas son petit frère !!
運命の出会いヒョウとケン! いまだ兄は弟を知らず!!
